spatial_accuracy.notes: Significant deviations in room placement and proportions. Covered Patio, Study, Dining Room, and Kitchen/Nook areas are considerably altered or missing. Many windows are missing or incorrectly placed. Doors also show numerous placement and orientation errors.

structural_fidelity.notes: Many rooms are missing (Covered Patio, Study, Nook, part of the main Covered Patio area). Hallucinated wall separating the Living Room from an adjacent space. Inconsistent wall thickness throughout and incorrect door embedding where present.

furniture_mapping.notes: Furniture is present but often incorrectly placed or scaled in relation to the floor plan. Many rooms that should have furniture are empty.

aesthetic_quality.notes: The isometric camera angle is acceptable, and general geometry is clean. However, lighting is very flat, failing to highlight depth or separate elements effectively. Orthographic projection seems mostly accurate but lacks visual interest due to lighting and texture.

detected_errors.description: Missing 'Covered Patio' to the left of Nook/Kitchen.
Missing 'Nook' area in the kitchen.
Missing 'Study' room entirely.
Missing 'Covered Patio' at the bottom left section (adjacent to Bedroom #4).
Kitchen layout and adjacency to Dining Room are completely altered.
Dining Room location is incorrect and its proportions are severely distorted.
Master Bedroom window placement is incorrect (missing corner windows).
Missing multiple windows in the Living Room area.
Missing numerous windows on the facade, for example, Bedroom #4 and Bedroom #2.
Door leading into Master Bedroom is misplaced and incorrectly oriented.
Door leading into Master Bath has incorrect orientation.
Door leading into Bedroom #3 is misplaced on the wall.
Door leading into Bedroom #2 is misplaced on the wall.
Door leading into Utility room is misplaced.
Door leading into Bedroom #4 is misplaced and incorrectly oriented.
Door leading from Hall to Bathroom is misplaced.
Incorrect orientation for several interior doors.
Significant proportion distortion in Kitchen, Dining Room, and Living Room areas.
Hallucinated wall segment near the entryway/Living Room, not present in the floor plan.
Hallucinated window in the 2 Car Garage area.
Flat lighting makes it difficult to discern subtle features; lacks depth.
